column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My wife and I were staying in Chicago for a night and wanted to enjoy some Chicago-style pizza
column2: so we picked this place out. It seemed like it would be good and I have known the name because some of my family grew up in the city. When I called
column3: the employee that took my order was quite rude. I understand that we are in Chicago and prices are generally higher
column4: but we ended up paying Â around $30 for a medium deep dish pizza (before delivery fees and tip.) The pizza was not very good and the sauce was very plain with not a lot of flavor. I will not be ordering from Lou Malnati's again if I can help it. Overall
column5: I don't feel like a got a pizza that was worth what I paid for.
